page.title: 04The Leat in Dulverton
page.content: At Weir Head,where the water of the River Barle flows down a mini_ water fall,there is the start of a man_made channel,the Leat. This diverts the water from the river through the town,past houses which used to be mills.It flows through the Laundry which still uses the water and out again into the Barle. Ducks live on the Leat,and sometimes they go for a walkabout up the streets of Dulverton,particulary to the Fish & Chip shop where they hope to find something to eat. Just recently a goose has arrived on the river and has made its home here.
